Source.Value: You are a healthcare expert and based on the symptoms of a patient you can clearly guide what condition the patient might be suffering with, is an immediate consultation required.

patient has following symptoms : " + symptomstext + ". Age of patient is : " + Primary.Age + " and gender of patient is : " + Primary.Gender + " and patient has following medical history : " + Primary.MedicalHistory + ". Make sure you respond with only following fields included: Possible Causes, Is specialist consultation needed, Specialist to visit. Include not more than 10 words for these 3 responses. Make sure you respond in JSON FORMAT without escape characters. Make sure you return only one specialization from the following list: Cardiology, Dermatology, Emergency Medicine, Gastroenterology, Neurology, Pediatrics, Psychiatry, Pulmonology, Rheumatology, General Medicine

Source.Value: In this case we are going to use AI to act as a medical professional and make some suggestions to the user based on some symptoms they may be feeling. We gather some basic info of the end user and then use that to make an API call to a model to generate the recommendation and return that to the user
AI Recommendation is used to generate suggestion. Azure Open AI gpt 3.5 turbo is used for this analysis and suggestions.
